sections.heading: What is 匹 (ひき/びき/ぴき)?
sections.content:
匹 is the counter for small to medium-sized animals. It has three pronunciations (ひき、びき、ぴき) that change depending on the number.

犬を2匹飼っています "I have 2 dogs" 金魚が5匹います "There are 5 goldfish"

sections.heading: Complete 匹 Counter Chart
sections.content: | Number | Reading | Romaji | Sound | | ------ | ---------- | --------- | ----- | | 1 | いっぴき | ippiki | ぴき | | 2 | にひき | ni-hiki | ひき | | 3 | さんびき | san-biki | びき | | 4 | よんひき | yon-hiki | ひき | | 5 | ごひき | go-hiki | ひき | | 6 | ろっぴき | roppiki | ぴき | | 7 | ななひき | nana-hiki | ひき | | 8 | はっぴき | happiki | ぴき | | 9 | きゅうひき | kyuu-hiki | ひき | | 10 | じゅっぴき | juppiki | ぴき |

children.heading: Larger Numbers
children.content: 11匹 = じゅういっぴき 20匹 = にじゅっぴき 100匹 = ひゃっぴき

children.heading: ひき (hiki) - Default
children.content: 2匹 (にひき) 4匹 (よんひき) 5匹 (ごひき) 7匹 (ななひき) 9匹 (きゅうひき)

children.heading: びき (biki) - After ん sound
children.content: 3匹 (さんびき) - after さん

children.heading: ぴき (piki) - After っ sound
children.content:
1匹 (いっぴき) - いち becomes いっ 6匹 (ろっぴき) - ろく becomes ろっ 8匹 (はっぴき) - はち becomes はっ 10匹 (じゅっぴき) - じゅう becomes じゅっ

Same pattern as 本 (hon/bon/pon)!

sections.heading: What Animals to Count with 匹

children.heading: Pets
children.content:
犬 (いぬ) - dogs 猫 (ねこ) - cats ハムスター - hamsters うさぎ - rabbits インコ - parakeets

犬を1匹飼っています "I have 1 dog" 猫が2匹います "There are 2 cats"

children.heading: Fish and Aquatic Animals
children.content:
金魚 (きんぎょ) - goldfish 魚 (さかな) - fish かえる - frogs かめ - turtles

金魚を5匹買いました "I bought 5 goldfish"

children.heading: Insects
children.content:
蝶 (ちょう) - butterflies 蜂 (はち) - bees 蚊 (か) - mosquitoes 虫 (むし) - insects/bugs

蝶が3匹飛んでいます "3 butterflies are flying"

children.heading: Small to Medium Wild Animals
children.content: リス - squirrels きつね - foxes たぬき - raccoon dogs ねずみ - mice/rats へび - snakes

children.heading: General Rule
children.content: Use 匹 for animals smaller than a human or about human-sized.

children.heading: 何匹 (なんびき)
children.content: 何匹いますか？ "How many are there?" ペットを何匹飼っていますか？ "How many pets do you have?" 犬が何匹いますか？ "How many dogs are there?" 金魚を何匹買いますか？ "How many goldfish will you buy?"

children.heading: Animal + を + 匹 Counter
children.content: 犬を2匹飼っています "I have 2 dogs" 金魚を5匹買いました "I bought 5 goldfish" 猫を1匹見ました "I saw 1 cat"

children.heading: Animal + が + 匹 Counter + Verb
children.content: 猫が3匹います "There are 3 cats" 犬が2匹走っています "2 dogs are running" 魚が10匹泳いでいます "10 fish are swimming"

children.heading: 匹 Counter + の + Animal
children.content: 2匹の犬 "2 dogs" 5匹の金魚 "5 goldfish" 3匹の猫 "3 cats"

children.heading: Example 1: Pet Shop
children.content: A: ペットを何匹飼っていますか？ "How many pets do you have?" B: 犬を2匹と猫を1匹飼っています "I have 2 dogs and 1 cat" A: 大変ですね "That must be a lot of work" B: でも、とても可愛いです "But they're very cute"

children.heading: Example 2: Aquarium
children.content: A: 金魚を何匹買いますか？ "How many goldfish will you buy?" B: 5匹ください "5, please" A: 水槽は大きいですか？ "Is your tank big?" B: はい、10匹ぐらい入ります "Yes, about 10 can fit"

children.heading: Example 3: Park
children.content: A: 公園に犬が何匹いますか？ "How many dogs are in the park?" B: 3匹います "There are 3" A: 大きい犬ですか？ "Are they big dogs?" B: いいえ、小さい犬です "No, they're small dogs"

children.heading: Large Animals - Use 頭 (とう)
children.content:
Wrong: 象を2匹 ❌ Right: 象を2頭 ✓ "2 elephants" Wrong: 馬を3匹 ❌ Right: 馬を3頭 ✓ "3 horses"

Large animals (cows, horses, elephants, etc.) use 頭.

children.heading: Birds (Sometimes) - Use 羽 (わ)
children.content:
Can use: 鳥を3匹 (acceptable) Better: 鳥を3羽 ✓ "3 birds"

For birds, 羽 is more specific, but 匹 is also used.

children.heading: Rabbits - Use 羽 (わ)
children.content:
Wrong: うさぎを2匹 ⚠️ Traditional: うさぎを2羽 ✓ "2 rabbits"

Historically, rabbits were counted with 羽 (like birds), but 匹 is now common in casual speech.

children.heading: 〜匹ずつ
children.content: 一匹ずつ見てください "Please look at each one" 2匹ずつケージに入れます "Put 2 in each cage"

children.heading: 〜匹目
children.content: 1匹目 (いっぴきめ) - the first one 2匹目 (にひきめ) - the second one 3匹目 (さんびきめ) - the third one 3匹目の猫が一番可愛い "The third cat is the cutest"

children.heading: 〜匹も
children.content: 10匹も飼っている "I have as many as 10" 5匹も捕まえた "I caught as many as 5"

children.heading: 〜匹しか
children.content: 1匹しかいない "There's only 1" 2匹しか残っていない "Only 2 remain"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Wrong sound changes
children.content: Wrong: いちひき (1) ❌ Right: いっぴき ✓ Wrong: さんひき (3) ❌ Right: さんびき ✓ Wrong: ろくひき (6) ❌ Right: ろっぴき ✓

children.heading: Mistake 2: Using 匹 for large animals
children.content: Wrong: 象が2匹 ❌ Right: 象が2頭 ✓ "2 elephants"

children.heading: Mistake 3: Using 匹 for people
children.content: Wrong: 子供が3匹 ❌ Right: 子供が3人 ✓ "3 children"

children.heading: Mistake 4: Confusing 何匹 reading
children.content: Wrong: なにひき ❌ Right: なんびき ✓ "How many (animals)?"

children.heading: Tricky Ones
children.content: 1匹 = いっぴき (not いちひき) 3匹 = さんびき (not さんひき) 6匹 = ろっぴき (not ろくひき) 8匹 = はっぴき (not はちひき) 10匹 = じゅっぴき (not じゅうひき)

children.heading: Basic
children.content: 猫が3匹います "There are 3 cats" 犬を2匹飼っています "I have 2 dogs" 金魚を5匹買いました "I bought 5 goldfish"

children.heading: Intermediate
children.content: ペットを何匹飼っていますか？ "How many pets do you have?" 公園に犬が何匹いますか？ "How many dogs are in the park?" この水槽には魚が10匹入ります "10 fish can fit in this tank"

children.heading: Advanced
children.content: うちには猫が3匹、犬が2匹、金魚が10匹います "We have 3 cats, 2 dogs, and 10 goldfish" 一匹ずつ丁寧に世話をしています "I take care of each one carefully" 子供の頃、ハムスターを5匹飼っていました "When I was a child, I had 5 hamsters"
